Articles.Content:
CommNet Antennas Extension

Add 6 new antennas for CommNet:

  • Class 2 direct (5M) — direct comrade for the High Gain Antenna HG-5
  • Class 2+ relay (32M) — exactly what you need for the innerSOI communication 
  • Class 3+ relay (7G) and Class 4+ relay (25G) — more powerful relays for more interesting interplanetary constellations
  • Class 5+ direct and relay (500G) — massive antennas for larger system or for a communication with less powerful antennas, 
    the combinability exponent equals 1.0

the 32M relay assets are taken from the Ven's Stock Revamp (assets are included)
the RemoteTech-redev-antennas (spacedock) it is a dependency, a link in the download section


Download: https://github.com/yalov/CommNetAntennasExtension/releases

Dependency:     https://github.com/RemoteTechnologiesGroup/RemoteTech-Antennas/releases

Languages: English, Русский, Français.  If anyone is interested in translating  — github

Recommended mod: Community Parts Titles

Donation: Patreon

  

    ﻿﻿﻿  

 

 

CommNet Antennas Info

A plugin improves Data Transmitter info panel in the VAB/SPH:

  • shows a combinability exponent (it's different even among the stock antennas)
  • shows modified ratings (if you have changed antennas or DSN power modifiers in the settings)
  • shows all DSN levels (Custom Barn Kit supported, and isn't dependency)
  • shows DSN ratings, hightlights active DSN level, 
  • shows range to Built-in antenna for relays
  • shows "Consumption" as EC/Mit
  • compact version for internal antennas 

  

Also the plugin add PAW group, and a button to the Internal Antennas (probes, pods) for showing Vessel Antenna Rating 

           

Download: https://github.com/yalov/CommNetAntennasInfo/releases

Languages: English, Русский, Français. If anyone is interested in translating  — github

Similar VAB's info panel improvement mods: Science Lab Info , Science Situation Info

Donation: Patreon

  

    ﻿﻿﻿  

 

 

CommNet Antennas Consumptor

adds ModuleGeneratorAntenna, which makes antennas consume EC for supporting CommNet.

  • Deployable Antennas consume EC when they are extended
  • Un-deployable Antennas support new enable/disable action,
    so they work and consume EC when they are enabled

Default rates depend on Antenna rating and type (changeable in the config):

  • Relays rates is exponential and relative to 100G: (Rating / 100E9)^0.4:
    • so 100G Relay is 1 EC/s, and 5M Relay is (5E6/100E9)^0.4 = 0.019 EC/s
  • Direct antennas rates 2 times lower: (Rating / 100E9)^0.4 / 2

Supports DmagicOrbitalScience, NearFutureExploration.

       

 

Download: https://github.com/yalov/CommNetAntennasConsumptor/releases

Languages: English, Русский, Français. If anyone is interested in translating  — github

Donation: Patreon

  

    ﻿﻿﻿  

 

Commnet Antennas Info was excluded from CommNet Antennas Extension on v2.0.0 (KSP 1.6.0)
Commnet Antennas Consumptor was excluded from Commnet Antennas Info on v3.0.0 (KSP 1.9.1)

Edited August 4, 2018 by flart

Hi, I am not aware of AIES-origin of some RT model assets. I need to contact the people behind them first before I can proceed. This may take some time.

@flart Good news, you have an alternative. We have a separate repository (linky) of stockised RT antennas for RT Redev at the same Gihub site. Users can download it separately (I need to publish downloadable release first) and you may need to provide post-RT MM cfgs for your mod if necessary. This will avoid all or most of license issues, if I am not wrong.

However, there is no plan to publish this repository on ckan until whole RT Redev is completed.

Thanks!

Edit: Turned out it isn't CKAN naming issue. Just odd metadata regex of CKAN on directory. I reverted the new change in SpaceDock and CKAN. It (v0.1) should be in CKAN soon.

Thanks for adding more antennas to the base game.....even if you borrowed them from Evil RemoteTech!

For some reason none of the antennas phone home after I leave the sphere of influence of Kebal. I have 4 25M rlay dishes on the way to Duna with a relay network around Kerbal and they lost connection as soon as they left. I have the dependency. Any idea what could be wrong?

@vmatt1203 Did you get all math right?

4x25M vessel + 4x25M relay satellite is no more than 100Mm distance. 

KSP CommNet Signal Strength Calculator

wiki

Coatl aerospace has weird programming. It seems once it detects remotetech folder(even with only antenna model) it disables its antenna function. So  commnet antenna extension is not compatible with coatl aerospace until coatl lad patched it.

Maybe place them into "RemoteTech-Antennas"?
